div.p: Seniors will join a parade of cars to receive their cap, gown, honor cords and a special gift! This event is by invitation only. Only vehicles transporting SCCPSS graduates will be allowed on campus.

span.title: Dates To Know - Displays a dynamic view of content from your site.

div.p: Whitney Administrative Complex - 3:30 PM

h4.a: CANCELED: Board of Public Education Meeting - Informal Session

div.p: Whitney Administrative Complex - 11:00 AM

h4.a: Board of Public Education Meeting - Regular Session

div.p: Videoconference - 2:00 PM
Whitney Administrative Complex - 9:00 AM

h4.a: Board of Public Education Meeting - Informal Session

div.p: Whitney Administrative Complex - 11:00 AM
Other Events​
While schools are closed due to the COVID-19 pandemic, SCCPSS continues to provide meals for students each week. The meals are delivered to more than 400 bus stops several days a week.

School closures due to the COVID-19 pandemic have required a different approach to teaching and learning. SCCPSS school and district staff have worked to provide both online and printed packet options.

div.h4: Do you want to help provide digital devices to students?
div.p: Schools have transitioned to online learning and we want to make sure every student who needs a device has access to one. Donations will be used to help fund the purchase of devices provided to students for completing their online classes!

span.title: District News - Displays a dynamic view of content from your site.

h4.a: SCCPSS Meal Plan Moves to Once a Week Delivery for the Remainder of the School Year

div.p: Each week the delivery schedule may be adjusted to avoid deliveries on a day when inclement weather is expected.

h4.a: SCCPSS Plans to Celebrate 2020 Graduates with Curbside Distribution of Caps, Gowns and Regalia

div.p: We hope to see each senior in the parade of cars for the curbside pickup to receive their cap, gown, honor cords, and a very special gift from the Superintendent of Schools.

h4.a: SCCPSS Meal Delivery Schedule Now Available for the Week of April 20-24, 2020

div.p: For the week of April 20th, meals will be distributed on Tuesday and Thursday only.

h4.a: Savannah-Chatham County Public Schools Launches SCCPSS-TV

div.p: Savannah-Chatham County Public School students (SCCPSS) can now look for lessons from some of their favorite teachers on Comcast Channel 195.

h4.a: SCCPSS Meal Delivery Schedule Now Available for the Week of April 13- 17, 2020

div.p: For the week of April 13th, meals will be distributed on Tuesday and Thursday only.

h4.a: SCCPSS Statement on Digital Access Issues

div.p: Google Classroom is a very popular system that is struggling under heavy loads across the globe as COVID-19 has locked the world’s population at home.

h4.a: SCCPSS Finance Division Awarded Certificate of Excellence

div.p: By participating in the COE program, school districts demonstrate their commitment to financial transparency.

h4.a: Independent Learning Plan for the Remainder of the 2019-20 School Year

div.p: Teachers will continue to provide assignments via electronic platforms like Google Classroom, Zoom, or others they may have used with their students this year.

The Savannah-Chatham County Public School System is committed to ensuring that all material on its websites are accessible to students, faculty, staff and the general public. If you experience difficulty with accessibility on any web pages or documents, please request the materials in an alternate format by contacting us: communications@sccpss.com
